preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure out 16 g of Ac (Acetate) using a precision scale.
2. Measure 64 g of La (Lanthanum).
3. Measure 12 g of Pr (Praseodymium).
4. Measure 64 g of Sn (Tin).
5. Combine all measured materials into a clean, dry mixing container.
6. Use a mechanical mixer or mortar and pestle to blend the powders thoroughly until a uniform mixture is achieved.
